text:
I was looking for a fitness group to join that is not too far away from home and found this. Terence, the trainer, was very prompt and helpful in providing me with the info that I requested. I signed up for my first trial work-out on the same day and it was just what I needed. The right intensity of workouts and abit of challenge to get my heart pumping. I was perspiring buckets after. The best part was the outdoor environment, participants who were very friendly and welcoming that made the evening very enjoyable.

I will definitely join them again.

Thoroughly enjoyed Terenceâ€™s class, instructions were clear and easy to follow, with different options of  varying intensities. It was a good full body workout, without being too overwhelming.  I love the community spirit here, the experienced participants were very supportive and helpful. The location was perfect, with little foot traffic. Highly recommended!

I started with Coach Terence many years back. Stopped for a few years as we shifted. Now that I'm back in the same area all I could think of was starting back with Coach Terence.
He motivates alot n let's us take it on our own pace. I loved his zumba classes when he use to have it. He is really a good n patient Coach!

Punggol Fit Club is amazing. Very good group exercises, good energy. I highly recommend.
Coach Terence is a very good trainer. He will guide you properly for exercises.
I am very happy to join and looking forward to continue this.

Glad to know this group exercise club at Punggol. My mum and I enjoyed the trial class very much. Instructor Terence is a nice guy and considerate by follow our pace coz we are just a beginner. The group members are very friendly too. We had fun and definitely will join the group soon.
